thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 20 of 1820
thread.title: Yen

author: Yen
title: Yen
text: I've used TransferWise twice, with little difficulty. In both cases, my money reached its intended destination very quickly, at the exchange rate advertised and agreed. My only complaint would be that TransferWise can be overeager sending the email confirming a successful transfer. That is, you may well receive, as I did on both occasions, an email claiming your transfer has been successful as much as a day prior to the money actually appearing in the destination account. Needless to say this can be a bit alarming, but don't panic: it is coming.
